title: Mock Draft Mayhem: Head-to-Head Battle! - Fantasy Football Podcast for 8/4
description:
On today’s fantasy football podcast, a head-to-head mock draft with lots of MAYHEM! Mike and Jason battle it out from draft spots 4 and 9. See how they react and tilt when Andy randomly vetos draft picks! Get tips for when things don’t go according to plan in a fantasy football draft! Plus, the latest edition of Best Ball Breakdown presented by Underdog Fantasy! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for August 4th, 2022.

The 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit and Draft Analyzer are available NOW

Mock Draft Results
